about: Located in Munich, Germany I am a technologically enthusiastic, dedicated, and inquisitive developer and architect with several years of experience in Python and Java, primarily in backend development. Additionally, I have a strong interest in artificial intelligence and machine learning, as well as the integration of these technologies into practical applications.

projects.name: RAG Chatbot
projects.description: Development of a cloud-native chatbot for the legal-tech sector that answers questions about documents based on large volumes of contract data in natural language. The focus of the work included designing and conceptualizing the cloud architecture, development, and guiding the internal development team

projects.name: Cloud Data Pipeline
projects.description: Design and implementation of a data pipeline to unify private equity data from various sources. Subsequently, this data was classified and evaluated using a classification model trained on crawled data In this project, I was responsible as a developer for the technical implementation and integration of the pipeline

projects.name: Health Prediction Platform
projects.description: Architectural design and development of a health profile platform for potential new customers of a pet insurance company, enabling users to conduct a risk analysis of their pets based on a predictive model. Additionally, guided the internal development and external integration teams, and conducted requirements analysis with the client.

projects.name: Online Market Platform for Farmers
projects.description: Tech lead and development of an online marketplace for trading operating supplies and feed between suppliers and farmers.

projects.name: Online Market Platform for Farmers
projects.description: Development of an online marketplace for trading operating supplies and feed between suppliers and farmers.

projects.name: Backend Development
projects.description: Redesign and development of the backend of an internal company news portal

projects.name: AI PoC applications for the music industry
projects.description: Development and integration of a backend for the automatic assignment of music playback information to the corresponding royalty groups: Conception and development of PoC applications using machine learning methods for the music industry, including a content-based music recommendation engine using Convolutional Neural Networks Backend application for the automatic assignment of music playback information to the corresponding royalties using decision trees

projects.name: Fullstack Development within the music industry
projects.description: Product development for an online music licensing tool, including feature development, release management, and maintenance

projects.name: Music Royalty Analysis Platform
projects.description: Support in the redesign of an online platform for artists and songwriters to analyze licensing revenues, including conceptualization, feature development, testing, and release management

projects.name: Master Thesis: Development of the Foundations of a Content-Based Music Recommendation System
projects.description: Conception and development of a PoC web application that provides content-based music recommendations for a given audio track using Convolutional Neural Networks and audio fingerprinting Evaluation and selection of methods for feature engineering and extraction from audio Development and evaluation of a similarity score
